mapper.select: SELECT a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_DCPRICE, b.* FROM PET_ITEM a, PET_ITEM_BASKET b WHERE b.basket_no = #{BASKET_NO} AND a.ITEM_NO = b.ITEM_NO
mapper.insert: insert into PET_ITEM_ORDER (ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, ORDER_BUYCOUNT, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_IMG, ORDER_NAME, RECEIVE_NO) values( ORDER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ITEM_NO}, #{BASKET_BUYCOUNT}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{ITEM_PRICE}, sysdate, 0, #{ITEM_IMG}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{RECEIVE_NO})
mapper.select: select a.* from ( select row_number() over(order by RECEIVE_NO DESC) as NO, ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, ORDER_BUYCOUNT, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_IMG, ORDER_NAME, RECEIVE_NO from pet_item_order where MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} and not ORDER_TYPE = 4) a where a.No between ${PAGING}*( ${PAGINGNO} -1)+1 and ${PAGING}*( ${PAGINGNO} ) order by RECEIVE_NO DESC
select count(*) as count from Pet_ITEM_ORDER where MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} and not ORDER_TYPE = 4
mapper.update: update PET_ITEM_ORDER set ORDER_TYPE = #{ORDER_TYPE} + 1 where RECEIVE_NO = #{RECEIVE_NO} and ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}
mapper.delete: delete from PET_ITEM_ORDER where ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO} and RECEIVE_NO = #{RECEIVE_NO}
